page.title: 08EATING HABITS
page.content: Most adults still prefer traditional food-cereals,eggs,bacon,toast for breakfast-roast beef,vegetables,gravy, sweet for dinner-a snack meal, sandwiches,cake or biscuits for tea-a hot drink,biscuits for supper.Pasties and fish and chips are favourites. Children like convenience foods- hamburgers,fishfingers,sausages,mixed grills,all with chips.Most tables have salt,pepper,sauces,especially tomato, and pickles.Tastes are moving towards salads and foreign dishes-pastas, curries,Chinese,pizzas,quiche lorraine.Coffee or juice has replaced tea.Meals are often eaten ,tea on lap, whilst watching T.V.No one says grace. People get up and down as they wish. Conversation is almost zero.Most children seem to eat at least one pack of potato crisps per day.
